level.text: When used in this chapter, the following words and terms shall have the meaning ascribed:
Director – the Director of the Department of Consumer and Regulatory Affairs or his or her designee.
Real Property – any residential or commercial building, or structure or lot.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Notice of Final Rulemaking published at 33 DCR 7860, 7862 (December 19, 1986).
